name: Droidsys
tagline: Workshop about the Android system internals
body:
Android System Internals Workshop
=================================

This is a companion site for a presentation given about some low-level components in the Android system. 

Useful Links
------------

Patrick Brady, Google I/O 2008, “[Anatomy and Physiology of an Android](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=G-36noTCaiA)"

Stefan Brähler, [Analysis of the Android Architecture](http://os.itec.kit.edu/downloads/sa_2010_braehler-stefan_android-architecture.pdf) (2010)

Brian Carlstrom, Anwar Ghuloum, Ian Rogers, Google I/O 2014, “[The ART Runtime](https://www.google.com/events/io/io14videos/b750c8da-aebe-e311-b297-00155d5066d7)”

David Ehringer, [The Dalvik Virtual Machine Architecture](http://davidehringer.com/software/android/The_Dalvik_Virtual_Machine.pdf) (2010)

Thorsten Schreiber, [Android Binder: Android Interprocess Communication](http://www.nds.rub.de/media/attachments/files/2012/03/binder.pdf) (2011)

Mark Sinnathamby, [Stack based vs Register based Virtual Machine Architecture, and the Dalvik VM](https://markfaction.wordpress.com/2012/07/15/stack-based-vs-register-based-virtual-machine-architecture-and-the-dalvik-vm/)

Stephen Smalley and Robert Craig, [Security Enhanced (SE) Android: Bringing Flexible MAC to Android](https://www.internetsociety.org/sites/default/files/02_4.pdf) (2013)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
